tn.text: This is the name of the king. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
These are people whose job is to make things with wood.
These are people whose job is to make things with stone or brick.
AT: "made him"

tn.ref: his kingdom was exalted on high for the sake of his people Israel
tn.text: AT: "Yahweh gave honor to David's kingdom to help the people of Israel" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]]

tn.ref: David had been anointed as king over all Israel
tn.text: AT: "the people of Israel had anointed David as their king" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
This is the name of a place. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
AT: "give you victory over them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
This is the name a place. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
This refers to David's resources. AT: "using my army" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])

tn.ref: like a bursting flood of water
tn.text: The power and victory of David's army is compared to a bursting flood of water. AT: "easily" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
AT: "to burn their false gods" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
"the Valley of Rephaim"
AT: "attack from the front"

tn.ref: circle around behind them and come on them through the balsam woods
tn.text: AT: "go through the forest of balsam trees and attack them from behind"
This is a type of tree. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
God continues his answer to David's question.
AT: "gone out ahead of you to fight for you" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]] [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
This is the name of a town. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.ref: David's fame went out into all lands
tn.text: AT: "People far away heard about David's victory over the Philistines" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
